attributes.action: put pressure on the Srilankan government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Thank you for supporting our course.

We need your continued support.

Sri Lankan forces had carried out an "intense barrage of heavy weapons into congested civilian areas" using canons and mortars, and that the onslaught had left hundreds dead and thousands injured. 
The tiny "safe zone" is littered with the victims of the shelling, with the air is thick with the smell of dead bodies. Journalists are not allowed to enter the zone. 
Tamils moved to the Srilankan control area are treated like politicians and kept in camps against their will. Please put pressure on Srilanka to release them all. 
Failure of their governments to act sooner will lead to an "inevitable" slaughter of civilians.

Yours sincerely



Tamil Diaspora
